content:
Hello everyone, I'm Marco, from Italy. I'm a senior developer, I started using Rust since 2017, loved it and one year ago changed work to be able to use it in my everyday job.
I've been invited here by @Pietro Albini because I'm willing to help, so if there is some core project who needs a developer, just contact me.
Best regards

Marco Napetti said:

Hello everyone, I'm Marco, from Italy. I'm a senior developer, I started using Rust since 2017, loved it and one year ago changed work to be able to use it in my everyday job.
I've been invited here by Pietro Albini because I'm willing to help, so if there is some core project who needs a developer, just contact me.
Best regards

hey @Marco Napetti did you end up being involved in anything?

Did you have a chance to read the WG-Prioritization blog call for contributors? I think that now we have enough eyeballs on the issues, but feel fre to stop by, if you want! Depending on what you're inclined to, you can also help the cleanup group on triaging bugs (i.e. helping in reproducing bugs or reducing them for easier debugging).

Or you can have a look at these groups if there's anything of interest: https://rustc-dev-guide.rust-lang.org/notification-groups/about.html
Hope these info help. ping me if you want :thumbs_up:

Hello @apiraino , sorry for the late reply but nobody ever replied me and I ended up uninstalling Zulip.
